summary: Nova montanha-russa do Harry Potter será inspirada na moto de Hagrid
title: Nova montanha-russa do Harry Potter será inspirada na moto de Hagrid
description:
Uma nova montanha-russa será inaugurada no The Wizarding World of Harry Potter, área dedicada às atrações do universo Harry Potter no parque Islands of Adventure, em Orlando. Hagrid’s Magical Creatures Motorbike Adventure (Aventura pelas criaturas mágicas na moto do Hagrid em tradução livre) será um passeio de moto entre algumas das criaturas mágicas mais raras do Mundo Bruxo. A nova atração será inaugurada em 13 de junho de 2019.

CONTINUA DEPOIS DA PUBLICIDADE

Hagrid’s Magical Creatures Motorbike Adventure substituirá antiga montanha-russa Dragon Challenge, que foi desativada em agosto de 2017. Mais informações sobre a nova atração serão reveladas em março pela Universal Orlando Resort.

Leia também:
+ Fãs poderão visitar Banco de Gringotes na Inglaterra
+ Beco Diagonal, no Universal Studios Florida, inaugura loja com produtos para viagem

The post Nova montanha-russa do Harry Potter será inspirada na moto de Hagrid appeared first on Potterish.com.

summary: I wonder if there’s an AU fic where Harry takes up Voldemort’s offer in the Philosopher’s Stone. Would Voldemort have actually...
body: I wonder if there’s an AU fic where Harry takes up Voldemort’s offer in the Philosopher’s Stone. Would Voldemort have actually given Harry the power he promised? Or would he just kill him?

body:
(for the ask I accidentally deleted oops)

“OH MY GOD YOU ARE INSUFFERABLE,” Hermione shrieked as she found Pansy—yet again—flirting with some dude.

“We are on a mission,” she whisper-screamed. “Or are you too dumb to understand that?!”

“Okay, first off, rude!” Pansy said, pointy a manicured finger at Hermione. “And second, it was just light flirting, to mix in with the muggles.”

Hermione snorted, “Yeah sure ‘to mix in’.” Pansy rolled her eyes.

“Let’s get you a drink, hothead,” Pansy said.

“Mission,” Hermione complained.

-

“Pansy,” Hermione said, tapping her side urgently, “Your 8 O'clock, is that Patterson?”

“Shit,” Pansy said, nearly choking on her drink. “What the fuck.”

He seemed to be heading towards them. They were on a mission to watch to that Wilson’s son, they weren’t supposed to run into Patterson. In no universe were they getting paid enough for this.

“What do we do?” Hermione asked, panic evident in her eyes.

“Kiss me.” Pansy said.

“What?”

"Public displays of affection make people uncomfortable.”

“Not in a club, no”

“Oh shut up.”

Pansy leaned forward and pressed her lips to Hermione’s. The kiss was soft, perhaps a little awkward at first. But then Hermione parted her lips, and Pansy placed her hands on Hermione’s hips, and the kiss sped up.

Patterson was long gone before the two girls parted.

“Public displays of affection make people uncomfortable, right,” Hermione said, grinning, and leaned forward to kiss Pansy again.

summary: Reblog and add on if you can think of more x
body:
What Harry Potter characters say when walking into a room


Harry: Hey guys!

-

Ron: *just kinda shuffles in and groans*

-

Hermione: Did you do your homework?

-

Draco: Potter

Pansy: Harry isn’t even here, Draco

-

Dumbledore: Greetings, my children, what is the tea?

-

Snape: 10 points from Gryffindor

-

Luna: Oh, look at that. The nargles are breeding!

-

Sirius: WASSUP MOTHERFUCKERS

-

Remus: Sorry about him

-

James: I’m here, you can relax now ;)

-

Peter: Hi

-

Ginny: Oi, you lot!

-

Oliver: Gimme a Q! Gimme a Widditch! What does that spell? Practise in 3 minutes motherfuckers, anyone who’s late can clean the bludgers.

-

Lily: Touch me Potter and you’ll never walk again

-

Blaise: Wither in my beauty bitches

-

Moody: CONSTANT VIGILANCE

-

Neville: YEET

-

Pansy: *dramatically poses like a maniac*

-

Hagrid: I shouldn’t’ve said ‘at. Should not’ve said ‘at.

-

Tonks: YOOOOOOOOOO

-

McGonnagall: Have a biscuit


*quick side note, all of these are just my thoughts and interpretations. If you disagree with any of these that’s totally fine, but please don’t take a defensive tone, because it’s all just for fun. Thx so much xoxo*

Reblog and add on if you can think of more x

summary:
Harry: Would you go to the Yule Ball with me, Malfoy?
Draco: In your dreams, Potter!
Harry: I already dream with it
Draco: Okay...
body:
Harry: Would you go to the Yule Ball with me, Malfoy?
Draco: In your dreams, Potter!
Harry: I already dream with it
Draco: Okay then. Be punctual. And gorgeous

title: Hidden love
body:
by MarvelWriter2006

Random without a back story, but Harry and Ginny- and a few others - are working for P.O.T.U, protectors of the universe. Protectors come from a different planet and can perform magic without needing a wand. They are incredibly powerful and the more power a person is born with the higher the rank. Harry and Ginny are known as Glitch and Shadow in P.O.T.U and are inseparable. Sent on a 20-year mission to stop Voldemort. Includes Daemons like in ‘The book of dust’ and characters and infinity stones from the MCU. They are the two strongest and were king and queen before the mission.

Words: 12, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Harry Potter Characters
  • Relationships: Harry Potter/Ginny Weasley
  • Additional Tags: Slytherin Harry Potter, Griffindoor Ginny, P.O.T.U

Read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2XhoPdK

title: The Dark Shroud
body:
by prospective

Voldemort was losing the war, so in a desperate attempt to sabotage Harry Potter’s childhood, he sends a muggle named Peter Parker back in time to the wizarding world. How will Peter get on with the witches and wizards of Britain?

Words: 3633, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling, Spider-Man - All Media Types
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings, Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Harry Potter, Hermione Granger, Ginny Weasley, Ron Weasley, Luna Lovegood
  • Relationships: Harry Potter/Ginny Weasley, Hermione Granger/Peter Parker, Hermione Granger/Ron Weasley, Luna Lovegood/Peter Parker
  • Additional Tags: Drama, Friendship, Romance, Alternate Universe, Hogwarts, Hogwarts Era, Suspense, Trust, Developing Relationship, Secret Identity, Growing Up, Coming of Age, Slow Burn, Complicated Relationships

Read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2GXt2NO

summary: Hey, I was wondering if you could help me find a fic I read years ago and have been looking for. Someone puts a curse on Draco...
question: Hey, I was wondering if you could help me find a fic I read years ago and have been looking for. Someone puts a curse on Draco so he keeps appearing where Harry is? Like, suddenly apparating into the same room out of his control and I'm pretty sure he can't leave. So if he wants to go anywhere like work, Harry has to drop him off so Draco moves in while they try to break the curse and I bet you can guess the rest. Thanks!!
answer: Interesting fic! I’ve actually never read anything like this before.. perhaps someone knows where to find this and maybe link it so we can both find it?

reblog.comment: Interesting fic! I’ve actually never read anything like this before.. perhaps someone knows where to find this and maybe link it so we can both find it?

trail.content_raw: Interesting fic! I’ve actually never read anything like this before.. perhaps someone knows where to find this and maybe link it so we can both find it?
